attributes.action: resign if it is proven that either he or one of his ministers had prior knowledge of the arrest of Damian Green
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is the most concerning attack on free speech that I can ever recall. If ministerial / prime ministerial prior knowledge is proven, we are on the slippery slope to a totalitarian state.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
